oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mechanism of negative bias temperature instability in CMOS devices: degradation, recovery and impact of nitrogen
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAHAPATRA, S
BHARATH KUMAR, P
DALEI, TR
SANA, D
ALAM, MA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cmos integrated circuit
electron traps
integrated circuit reliability
interface phenomena
nitridation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: NBTI mechanism is discussed for a wide range of stress conditions. Conditions for interface and bulk-trap generation are shown. The bias, time and temperature dependence of interface-trap buildup and recovery are discussed using the framework of the R-D model. The AC frequency dependence and impact of gate oxide nitridation are also discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the IEEE International Electron Devices Meeting Technical Digest, San Francisco, USA, 13-15 December 2004, 105-108.
